news: [Feature] Help the community and translate jSQL into your language, particularly Portuguese and Arabic. Click on the top right button to show the advanced settings and open menu Community, choose a language using 'I help translate jSQL' and translate some text then click on Send. Your translation will be integrated to the next release by the developer.
[Contribute] Devops APIs integration for PHP .NET Python Node, CTF and vuln application tests, ProGuard shrink
[Roadmap] WAF fingerprint, Inject user defined query, Inject range of rows
[Done] Strategy Dios, Fingerprint database and insertion char
